title: Canons and constitutions ecclesiasticall gathered and put in forme, for the governament of the Church of Scotland. Ratified and approved by his Majesties royall warrand, and ordained to be observed by the clergie, and all others whom they concerne. Published by authoritie.
author: Episcopal Church in Scotland.
publisher: Imprinted by Edward Raban, dwelling vpon the Market-place, at the Armes of the Citie,
